Title: detectLanguage
Description: Detects the language of the UTF8-encoded input string. The function uses the CLD2 library for detection, and it returns the 2-letter ISO language code.
The detectLanguage function works best when providing over 200 characters in the input string.
text_to_be_analyzed — A collection (or sentences) of strings to analyze. String.
The 2-letter ISO code of the detected language
un = unknown, can not detect any language.other = the detected language does not have 2 letter code.
Examples: SELECT detectLanguage('Je pense que je ne parviendrai jamais à parler français comme un natif. Where there’s a will, there’s a way.');
